_header: Ave Queen of heaven Lady of earth Well of all bounty
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: Prayers to the Virgin (with account of Joys and Sorrows) and Jesus — 181 lines in couplets

HarRich22.First Lines:
Aue quene of heuen ladi of erþe welle of all
                    bownteEmperice of helle & of mekenes þe souereynteRyht briht
                    sterre schynynge of all fayrnes þe flourThrow ȝow haue we
                        grace counfort and socour…
HarRich22.Last Lines:
…Sende me þan at þat tyme soche ioye &
                    comfortyngeThat I schal come & dwelle wiþ þe in blysse
                    euerlastingeLord ihesu god ȝyf it be þyn wylle
HarRich22.Note:
Fourth line originally left out, but added by scribe at bottom margin
                    with caret at end of line 3.
